alert.note: Alert for Collin; Fannin; Grayson; Hunt (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 2:00AM CDT until June 16 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Hunt County in north central Texas... Northeastern Collin County in north central Texas... Southeastern Grayson County in north central Texas... Southern Fannin County in north central Texas... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Savoy to Van Alstyne, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Bonham, Commerce, Van Alstyne, Leonard, Honey Grove, Whitewright, Wolfe City, Bells, Tom Bean, Savoy, Celeste, Ector, Campbell, Trenton, Dodd City, Bonham State Park, Valley Lake, Randolph, Ladonia and Bailey. This includes Interstate 30 between mile markers 103 and 109. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
